title: Unify contract vs proposal lifecycle state model
description: Clarify and align state transitions between wishes, proposals, contracts, claims, submissions, PSBT, and closure. Remove ambiguity that makes the flow hard to follow.
close_reason: Documented lifecycle state model and aligned status comments

title: Interactive API playground
close_reason: Closed

title: Detect testnet4 network from base URL
description: BitcoinNodeClient inferred 'testnet' for testnet4 URLs because it only checked for 'testnet'. This caused raw block fetches to hit blockstream testnet instead of mempool testnet4.
close_reason: Infer testnet4 before testnet in BitcoinNodeClient

title: Reaudit Dec 26 MCP/payment/validation changes
description: Audit regressions from Dec 26 closed issues (payment_details endpoint, proposal validation, MCP docs) and create fixes or follow-up bugs.
close_reason: Reaudit complete; regressions addressed in payment-details and proposal validation.

title: Update search placeholder and labels
description: Change search placeholder to 'Search...' and rename inscription labels to Transactions.
close_reason: Updated search placeholder and labels.

title: Add metrics/logging for IPFS mirror publish/subscribe and ingest outcomes
description: Add info logs for IPFS mirror publish and ingest outcomes with file counts.
close_reason: Added publish and sync summary logs with counts.

title: Filter confirmed contracts from Discover proposals API
description: Exclude confirmed/on-chain contracts from proposals API used by Discover page; rely on oracle reconcile to mark status.
close_reason: Filter confirmed ingestions from proposals API by default.

title: Hide PSBT builder when no deliverables
description: In Deliverables tab, the Publish & Build PSBT panel still appears when there are no deliverable tasks. Hide/disable the PSBT builder entirely until tasks/deliverables exist (post-approval) to avoid confusion.
close_reason: Closed

title: Reorder PSBT metadata and remove helper text
description: Move Payer/Network metadata above PSBT hex textbox and remove the Sparrow helper text.
close_reason: Move payer/network above PSBT; remove helper text

title: Reorder Publish & Build PSBT summary into invoice layout
description: Reorder PSBT summary UI to show payer/network/payout script first, then invoice-like breakdown with Selected, Budget (Price), Commitment (Donation), Fee, Change.
close_reason: Reordered PSBT summary into invoice layout.

title: Remove pixel hash field from PSBT UI
description: PSBT builder UI shows Pixel Hash as N/A; field is not needed for users. Remove Pixel Hash display/input from PSBT UI.
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix ESLint warnings in frontend
description: Resolve current ESLint warnings after adding lint configuration.
close_reason: Fixed DeliverablesReview memoization to stop test loop

title: Deliverable Review UI refresh collapses review while reviewing
description: Deliverable Review UI refresh/collapse interrupts active review; improve usability so reviewers don't lose context while review is in progress.
close_reason: Preserve review state across refresh; prune stale entries only

title: Allow smart contract card image height to grow
description: Remove fixed height so tall images can display more of the content in cards.
close_reason: Remove fixed card height and allow taller images

title: Pending view should merge ingestion data regardless of ingestion status
description: Pending contracts need image/text from ingestion even when ingestion status is not pending; adjust pending-transactions merge to list recent ingestions without status filter.
close_reason: Merge ingestion data for pending contracts regardless of ingestion status

title: Add submission preview and summary in list
description: Show preview snippet, word count, metadata, and quick approve/reject actions with expandable detail.
close_reason: Completed

title: Smart Contract Details: fix wallet address regression
description: Wallet Address in Smart Contract/Inscription Details shows a hard-coded value instead of the actual address. Fix binding to display the correct wallet (funding/payer or inscription metadata) across tabs, no hard-coded demo values.
close_reason: Outdated

comments.author: eric
comments.text: Regression: Wallet Address shows a hard-coded value. Fix binding to real funding/payer/inscription wallet across tabs. For inscriptions discovered from blocks (no contract/task context), hide Wallet Address and Budget fields to avoid misleading placeholders.

title: Support donation toggle for commitment output pubkey
close_reason: Added commitment target toggle for donation vs funding address

title: Fix fund deposit auto-fill and layout ordering
description: Auto-fill fund deposit address using task funding metadata; reorder checkboxes and widen fee rate field.
close_reason: Auto-filled fund deposit address and adjusted checkbox/fee layout.

title: Separate smart contract vs inscription counts
description: Smart contracts are being counted as inscriptions in UI/API; add distinct counting to avoid conflating smart_contract_count with inscription_count.
close_reason: Separate smart contract and inscription counts in summaries/UI

title: Review security patch banning word 'update' for SQL injection risk
description: Assess whether blocking the word 'update' is a valid SQL injection mitigation; locate patch/code and evaluate.
close_reason: Completed review

title: Use txid-based filenames for oracle reconcile
description: Store extracted/moved images using txid-based filenames to avoid collisions and simplify oracle reconcile lookup and matching.
close_reason: Use txid-based filenames when moving oracle-matched images

title: Expose oracle smart contracts in block-inscriptions response
description: GUI uses /api/data/block-inscriptions and block summaries; when oracle reconciliation creates smart_contracts but no inscriptions, the UI shows nothing. Synthesize inscription entries from smart_contracts and provide image_url via /api/block-image.
close_reason: Map smart contracts into block inscriptions responses

title: PSBT payout split rules and fee estimation refinements
description: Define payout-splitting rules (task-level vs proposal-level budgets, validation rules, ordering) and revisit fee estimation to minimize relay shortfalls without overpaying.
close_reason: Relaxed payout validation, added flexible payout selection, and adjusted fee buffer behavior.

title: Add optional donation checkbox and right-align PSBT invoice amounts
description: Add donation (commitment) checkbox default on; right-align invoice rows in PSBT summary.
close_reason: Added donation toggle and right-aligned invoice layout.

title: Always include P2WSH commitment output in PSBT builds
close_reason: Always include P2WSH commitment output in PSBT builds

title: Backfill funding_txid via proposal ingestion_id
description: If PSBT uses a stego contract id, resolve ingestion_id from proposal metadata and persist funding_txid and payout script hashes on that ingestion record.
close_reason: Resolve ingestion_id via proposal metadata for PSBT funding metadata updates.

title: Use wish text in pending stego ingest
description: When publishing pending stego ingest, set message from wish_text/embedded_message so remote pending transactions show the human wish.

title: Document /api/inscribe price units and optional image fields
description: Clarify /api/inscribe price units (BTC string) and require image (multipart or image_base64) since steganographic image is mandatory for wish creation.
close_reason: Documented /api/inscribe price units and image requirement

title: Update and complete MCP API documentation with accurate examples
description: Updated MCP API documentation with complete proposal examples including tasks array, metadata, and budget validation. Added payment_details endpoint documentation and complete payment workflow guide.
notes: Revisited in starlight-0w3i: MCP docs reviewed; no doc changes required for current endpoint behavior.
close_reason: Updated MCP API documentation with complete examples and payment workflow

title: performance issue when rendering inscription images
description: Stargate frontend gets HTTP code 408 frequently when there is large number of inscriptions to render.
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix MCP tool REST calls missing X-API-Key
description: Ensure /mcp/call forwards the caller's X-API-Key to REST fallbacks so claim_task can bind contractor wallets.
close_reason: Forward caller API key through /mcp/call REST fallbacks and use it for claim wallet lookup.

title: Standardize header naming (pick one case)
close_reason: Closed

title: Disable PSBT when funding wallet mismatch
description: Disable Publish & Build PSBT if the signed-in wallet does not match the funding wallet recorded for the contract/task.
close_reason: Disable Publish & Build when funding wallet differs

title: Sweep commitments during oracle reconcile
description: Trigger commitment sweep when oracle reconcile confirms a contract so missed sweeps are handled immediately.
close_reason: Sweep on oracle reconcile via shared sweep helper

title: Remove fake QR code after smart contract inscription and refresh pending transaction
close_reason: Removed fake QR flow and refresh pending list after inscription

title: Confirmed block shows duplicate contracts with unknown_*.png IDs
description: After oracle reconcile, confirmed block lists extra contracts using image filenames (unknown_*.png). Only real txid contract should appear.
close_reason: Preserve contract metadata so confirmed views show content and proposals

title: Set contract status to confirmed when oracle reconcile confirms ingestion
description: When oracle reconcile moves a confirmed ingestion image into blocks, update the MCP contract status to confirmed (or another agreed value) so confirmed contracts are no longer treated as open.
close_reason: Marked contracts confirmed when oracle reconcile confirms ingestion.

title: Auto-sweep confirmed proofs
description: Ensure commitment sweep runs for confirmed proofs even when confirmation status is already confirmed (not just provisional).
close_reason: Run sweep logic for confirmed proofs as well

title: Document payment workflow from wallet association to PSBT building
description: Already documented complete payment workflow in MCP docs including wallet association, payment details endpoint, and PSBT building steps.
notes: Revisited in starlight-0w3i: payment workflow docs reviewed; behavior remains consistent.
close_reason: Payment workflow already documented in MCP API docs

title: Unify upload->blocks reconcile with stego ingest
description: Update stego publish to backfill ingestion metadata and ensure stego reconcile runs even when uploads->blocks move fails.
close_reason: Backfill stego metadata on ingestion at approval and reconcile stego even if move fails.

title: Make GET /mcp/ return helpful JSON with links
close_reason: Added /mcp index JSON with links

title: Fix approved proposal validation not deployed
description: Deployed validation code but issue persists in production. PGStore uses ValidateProposalInput correctly (zero budget validation works), but approved proposals with empty tasks still being approved. May be deployment timing issue or edge case in validation logic. Zero budget validation is working correctly.
close_reason: Require tasks at approval time and update tests to include tasks.

title: Create roadmap proposal for contract 4e5c15a0...
description: Draft and submit MCP proposal with vision, budget, and tasks for the starlight roadmap contract.
close_reason: Submitted MCP proposal

title: Include stego payload metadata in IPFS ingestion records
close_reason: Merged stego payload metadata into IPFS ingestion records

title: Define and document end-to-end wish→proposal→contract workflow
description: Document the ideal flow: inscribe wish → create proposal → approve into contract → claim/submit → review → PSBT → confirm → close. Provide step-by-step API + UI mapping and roles (agent1/agent2).
close_reason: Documented end-to-end wish→proposal→contract workflow

title: Prefer approved proposal for stego payload
description: When building PSBT stego payload, resolve proposal ID by preferring approved/published proposals for a visible hash instead of the wish proposal ID.
close_reason: Prefer approved proposal when resolving stego payload

title: Persist API key wallet bindings server-side
description: Ensure wallet_address is stored with API keys so contractors can claim tasks without re-supplying wallets; update auth/login and claim flows to persist wallet mappings.
close_reason: Persist wallet bindings via auth login and claim updates (server-side API key wallet mapping).

title: Add split per-payer PSBT option for raise_fund
close_reason: Closed

title: Local instance missing pending transaction after IPFS ingest
description: Image replicated via IPFS (file present) but local instance shows no pending transaction for same visible_pixel_hash; likely proposal/contract ingestion missing or UI filtering.
close_reason: Pending transactions now include proposals; IPFS-ingested wish shows in local pending view.

title: IPFS ingest sync should merge funding/commitment metadata for remote reconcile
close_reason: Published ingest_update announcements for funding/commitment metadata; IPFS ingest applies updates.

title: visible_pixel_hash is truncated (8 bytes) and unusable for PSBT/oracle matching
description: visible_pixel_hash is computed as only 8 bytes (short hash). Needs full-length 32-byte hash (sha256) for PSBT/oracle matching; update computeVisiblePixelHash and ingestion metadata to store full hash.
close_reason: Done

title: Add Taproot option for PSBT builder
description: Add a Taproot option to the PSBT builder: allow payer/change and/or payout to use taproot (bc1p/tb1p) when wallets support it, lowering fees. Keep P2WPKH as default for compatibility. Update UI toggle, fee estimation, and builder logic to handle taproot addresses/scripts.
close_reason: Closed

title: Show payer address from signed-in wallet in payout mode
description: Deliverables Review shows empty Payer address in payout mode; use auth.wallet as fallback when not raise_fund.
close_reason: Use auth.wallet for payout payer address display

title: Stego metadata missing for confirmed contracts
description: Confirmed smart contracts sometimes lack stego flags/metadata in UI despite stego payload present. Verify scan metadata propagation for confirmed blocks.
close_reason: Fixed

title: Propagate PSBT metadata into proposal for stego payload
description: Update proposal metadata with funding_txid/commitment_lock_address during PSBT build so stego payload carries match data across instances.
close_reason: Stopped by user; PSBT metadata should not be propagated

title: Enable task reclaim after rejection
description: Ensure rejected tasks return to available status, clear claim association, and track attempt count with rejection feedback.
close_reason: Completed

title: PSBT payout targets wrong output
description: Sparrow import shows PSBT consolidating to funder wallet instead of paying contractor payout from task; ensure payout output uses contractor/funding_address and not funder change only.
close_reason: Closed

title: Reduce deliverables refresh blink and prefer latest submission
description: Background refresh should not toggle loading or reset state; proposals tab should show latest submission status instead of task default. Also constrain notes overflow.
close_reason: Updated refresh behavior, task status display, and notes overflow

title: Archive wish after approved contract; ingest proposal from stego
close_reason: Implemented

title: Auth re-login loses wallet binding
close_reason: Closed

title: Infer network from wallet addresses
description: Smart Contract Details shows wrong network (mainnet) for testnet contracts. Update network detection to infer from funding/payer/contractor wallet addresses first (bech32/base58 hrp/prefix), fallback to metadata, and only then health endpoint. Display testnet when wallets are testnet addresses.
close_reason: Closed

title: Update smart contract grid cards to photo-style layout
description: Make smart contract grid cards resemble contracts poster style but smaller photo size with headline overlay.
close_reason: Adjusted smart contract grid to 3-column flow layout

title: Inscribe flow price not reflected in total_budget_sats
description: Inscribe flow shows price but total_budget_sats stays 0; wire price -> total_budget_sats.

title: Add approval-guard tests
description: Add tests for REST/MCP proposal approval guard requiring wish contract.
close_reason: Added REST/MCP approval guard tests

title: Remove NODE_OPTIONS localstorage warning from frontend test runs
description: Stop injecting --localstorage-file into frontend Node options so tests run without warnings.
close_reason: Suppress test warning noise via NODE_NO_WARNINGS

title: Add contract/task filters for agent coordination
description: Add contract_id filter to list_tasks and creator/ai_identifier filters to list_contracts to support multi-agent workflows.
close_reason: Add contract/task filters for list_contracts and list_tasks

title: Auto-select stego method by image type and add wish contract prefix
description: Auto-select stego method based on image type in /api/inscribe. Map JPEG->exif (fallback eoi), PNG->alpha, GIF->palette; keep requested method if compatible. Add wish-<visible_hash> prefix for pre-approval contracts; pending list merges ingestion records into wish contracts; wish contracts archived (status=superseded) when stego publish succeeds.
close_reason: Implemented stego method selection and wish contract lifecycle.

title: Hide PSBT for confirmed contracts uses right fields
description: Contract shows confirmed in UI but Deliverables still renders Publish & Build PSBT; expand confirmation detection to include top-level confirmed fields/status.
close_reason: Check top-level confirmation fields for PSBT gating

title: Publish pending ingestion announcements over IPFS pubsub
description: Add pubsub announcements for pending ingestions and subscribe to create pending ingestion records on peers without shared manifest.
close_reason: Done

title: Add submission comparison view
description: Provide side-by-side submission comparison with status filters, sorting, and export.
close_reason: Completed

title: Content handler should resolve txids via smart contracts
description: Frontend uses /content/{txid}?witness=0. When oracle reconciliation only populates smart_contracts, tx index and content lookups fail. Include smart_contracts when building tx index and resolving inscriptions.
close_reason: Include smart contracts when resolving content txids

title: Fix fund deposit autofill and checkbox styling
description: Ignore placeholder deposit address, prefer funding metadata, and remove gray borders on checkbox rows.
close_reason: Ignore placeholder deposit address and restyle checkbox rows.

title: Add deterministic YAML manifest builder for stego payload
close_reason: Added deterministic YAML manifest builder

title: Auto-sweep commitment outputs on confirmation
description: When a funding tx confirms and a task has commitment metadata (redeem script, vout, visible pixel hash), automatically build and broadcast the sweep tx to STARLIGHT_DONATION_ADDRESS. Persist sweep txid/status and guard against dust outputs.
close_reason: Auto-sweep added in funding sync with broadcast + status tracking.

title: UI shows 0 smart contracts despite block-summaries count
description: block-summaries API reports smart_contract_count > 0 but frontend shows 0; investigate mapping in UI counters and ensure smart_contract_count is consumed.
close_reason: UI now uses smart_contract_count and smart_contracts

title: Log sweep broadcasts
description: Add backend log entry when commitment sweep broadcast succeeds so oracle reconcile runs are visible.
close_reason: Add log on sweep broadcast

title: Block monitor fetches mainnet raw blocks when BITCOIN_NETWORK=testnet4
close_reason: Done

title: Validate review rejection/resubmission scenarios
description: Run Round 3 test scenarios for rejection/resubmission flow, multi-round contest, and long-form submission stress test.
close_reason: Reviewed Round 3 submissions; approved/rejected accordingly and fixed submissions API scan

title: Move confirmed smart contract from uploads directory to the correct block height images directory
description: block monitor should check pixel hash and payout script hash to move image to designated block height directory for historical record keeping, and update smart contract info for the block accordingly
close_reason: Done

title: Round 5 wish + proposal approval + progress review
description: Create Round 5 wish, allow agents to propose, approve best proposal, and review progress.
close_reason: Created Round 5 wish, approved proposal, reviewed progress

title: Block summary drops smart_contracts when stegoCount is zero
description: saveBlockSummaryWithScanResults writes smart_contracts as empty when stegoCount==0, wiping oracle-reconciled contracts from inscriptions.json.
close_reason: Block summary now preserves smart_contracts even when stegoCount==0.

title: Fix IPFS pubsub publish payload
close_reason: Send pubsub data as multipart

title: PSBT should store funding_txid even when use_pixel_hash=false
description: handleContractPSBT only saved funding_txid when use_pixel_hash resolved an ingestion record. This prevents oracle reconcile from matching by txid when pixel hash is disabled.
close_reason: Always load ingestion by contract id for funding_txid storage

title: Polish fundraiser payout UI labels and defaults
description: Update fundraiser labels (Raise Fund / Deposit Fund) and align checkbox styling; default deposit to contract creator address.
close_reason: Superseded by starlight-dbj updates.

title: Use contractor wallets as payer_addresses for raise_fund PSBT
description: Derive multi-payer inputs from claimed contractor wallets for raise_fund contracts, with change sent to contract creator address, and remove UI toggles.
close_reason: Derive raise_fund payers from contractor wallets

title: Remove SQL keyword stripping from input sanitizer
description: Eliminate SQL keyword blacklist from SanitizeInput; rely on parameterized queries. Adjust tests if needed.
close_reason: Removed SQL keyword blacklist

title: Update MCP e2e workflow script for current API
description: Refresh scripts/e2e_mcp_workflow.sh to use /mcp/call and cover payout + raise_fund flows; handle PSBT build and known no-UTXO warnings.
close_reason: Updated script and validated payout/raise-fund flows

title: Fix PSBT UI to use contract id (visible pixel hash)
close_reason: Implemented

title: Remove zero confidence placeholders in smart contract grid and details
description: Smart contract grid and details show a 0 where stego confidence placeholder used to be; hide confidence indicators when zero.
close_reason: Hide zero-percent confidence indicators in cards and details

title: Pending transactions dedupe by contract id
description: Pending transactions shows multiple IDs for one wish (proposal id, ingestion id, contract id). Dedupe by canonical contract/visible_pixel_hash so only canonical contract appears.
close_reason: Also dedupe pending ingestions by wish key derived from proposal description/title.

title: Add funding_mode metadata at inscribe and use to preselect PSBT flow
close_reason: Added funding_mode to inscribe metadata and PSBT defaults

title: Migrate frontend from CRA (react-scripts) to Vite to address dependency vulnerabilities
close_reason: Completed Vite migration and resolved vulnerabilities

title: Use funder wallet for fundraiser payout address in e2e script
description: Prefer funder wallet address as fundraiser payout address in scripts/e2e_mcp_workflow.sh; fall back to explicit FUNDRAISER_PAYOUT_ADDRESS.
close_reason: Default fundraiser payout to funder wallet

title: Disable ability to register if no wallet address given in stargate
close_reason: Closed

title: Periodic reconciliation sweep for recent blocks
description: Add a background sweep that reconciles the last N blocks against all ingestions to self-heal missed matches.
close_reason: Completed

title: Add /mcp/ metadata counts
description: Include tool/task/contract counts in /mcp/ discovery response to help agents gauge available work.
close_reason: Added tool/task/contract counts to /mcp/ discovery

title: Add investor funding tab to Discover
description: Expose funding_mode=raise_fund proposals in Discover with investor-focused actions.
close_reason: Added investor funding tab and contract open flow

title: Unify publish + PSBT build in Deliverables
description: Combine proposal publish and PSBT build into a single action in Deliverables. Surface contractor wallet (from claim) and payout script; block action until wallet present. On click: approve/publish proposal if needed, build PSBT with chosen fee rate and budgets, and return payout script + PSBT hex. Keep fee control; compact UI; retire separate builder in Proposals tab.
close_reason: Closed

title: Show payout summary by contractor wallet
description: In Deliverables PSBT panel, list payout totals per contractor wallet (sum of approved task budgets).
close_reason: Aligned PSBT fields and added QR option

title: Deduplicate wish IDs so discover/pending/open-contracts show only the canonical contract
description: Wishes are surfacing multiple IDs in /discover, /api/pending-transactions, and /api/open-contracts. Deduplicate to only expose the canonical visible_pixel_hash contract (e.g., 840e...) and hide alternate IDs from ingestion/proposal/IPFS paths.
close_reason: Deduplicate discover/pending by contract title; ignore stego manifest text; normalize stego payload proposal IDs.

title: Skip stego proposal without wish
description: Prevent ensureProposalFromStegoPayload from creating a new proposal unless a corresponding wish contract exists; avoids text-only stray proposals from stego payload sync.
close_reason: Skip stego proposal creation without wish contract

title: Use approved proposal metadata for fundraiser/payout addresses in UI
close_reason: Updated UI address resolution to use approved proposal metadata

title: Hide zero file-size badge in smart contract grid
description: Confirmed contract cards show '0' below image when size_bytes is 0 or string '0'; hide badge unless size > 0.
close_reason: Hide size badge when size_bytes is zero

title: Raise fund PSBT should use selected task budget
description: Require task_id for raise_fund and set target to that task's budget; avoid charging full contract budget per investor.
close_reason: Use task budget for raise_fund PSBT

title: Frontend integrate PSBT builder
description: Wire the UI to call POST /api/smart_contract/contracts/{id}/psbt with payer API key wallet, contractor wallet/api key, optional pixel hash; display base64 PSBT and summary for Sparrow.
close_reason: Closed

title: GET submission by ID fails on NULL rejection fields
description: GET /api/smart_contract/submissions/{id} returns error: cannot scan NULL into *string for rejection_reason. Likely use sql.NullString or COALESCE in pg_store scan.
close_reason: Fixed NULL scan in submissions list

title: Sync pending stego ingestion after PSBT
description: After PSBT build, publish a pending stego ingestion update so remote nodes create a pending ingestion record (with stego image/payload) for oracle reconcile, without marking confirmed.
close_reason: Publish pending stego ingest after PSBT

title: Split raise-fund PSBTs do not update task merkle_proof tx_id/commitment data
close_reason: Done

title: Add strict validation for proposals with tasks and budget requirements
description: Added strict validation for proposals: tasks must have positive budget_sats, approved proposals must contain tasks. Prevents dead-end contracts and budgetless tasks.
notes: Revisited in starlight-0w3i: proposal validation now accepts top-level visible_pixel_hash, stores metadata consistently, and avoids blocking approvals without tasks.
close_reason: Implemented strict proposal validation for tasks and budgets

title: Embed wish timestamp into inscribed message for stable visible hash
description: When inscribing a wish, embed the human wish plus a timestamp tag into the image payload and use that for visible_pixel_hash. Strip the tag for display/proposal text.
close_reason: Embed timestamp in inscribed message, use for visible hash, strip tag for display/proposals.

title: Use contract id for PSBT build instead of proposal id
description: Build PSBT should prefer task/approved proposal contract_id or visible_pixel_hash instead of proposal id when assembling /contracts/{id}/psbt URL.
close_reason: Avoid proposal ids in PSBT contract selection

title: Remove fundraiser equals payer warning
description: Remove warning about fundraiser address matching payer wallet (UTXO consolidation use case).
close_reason: Removed fundraiser/payer match warning.

title: Align Discover filter controls
description: Status dropdown height/width should match other filters on Discover page.
close_reason: Normalized filter control sizing

title: generate PSBT transaction from smart contract for sparrow wallet
close_reason: Adjusted PSBT outputs to pay contractor and add pixel-hash commitment

comments.author: eric
comments.text: This is implemented for funder to payout contractors.  Is it possible to perform fund raiser style contract, where contractors pay the funder?

title: Set fundraiser payout address from approver API key
description: On proposal approval, backend should set payout/funding address for raise_fund using approver API key wallet binding.
close_reason: Set fundraiser payout/funding address from approver wallet on approve

title: Show P2WSH fee share in PSBT summary
description: Display estimated P2WSH fee share in the Publish & Build PSBT summary so users understand the commitment fee component.
close_reason: No change needed; keep original commitment display

title: Better error message hints
close_reason: Done

title: Add MCP claim_task wallet binding regression test
description: Ensure /mcp/call claim_task uses API key wallet when wallet_address omitted.
close_reason: Added http_mcp_server_test coverage for API key wallet binding on claim_task.

title: Allow proposals by wish hash without ingestion_id
close_reason: Implemented

title: Oracle reconcile should move confirmed contracts out of pending and update txid
description: When a contract confirms on-chain, its txid changes; pending view should drop it and confirmed block should show updated contract details from reconcile.
close_reason: Skip pending contracts once ingestion is confirmed

title: Pending images not rendering in UI
description: Pending transaction images exist in /data/uploads but frontend preview is blank; handle imageData paths with proper URL encoding and /uploads path mapping.
close_reason: Build pending image URLs from uploads path with encoding

title: Add /mcp/changelog endpoint
description: Provide a simple /mcp/changelog endpoint (or docs section) listing recent breaking changes and migrations for agents.
close_reason: Dropped to avoid context bloat

title: Include proposal content in stego payload
description: Embed proposal title/description/budget and wish text/price in stego metadata.

title: Fix saved keys select height and add QR wallet challenge
description: Align Saved Keys select height with other fields on Sign-In page; add QR code rendering for wallet challenge.
close_reason: Match select height and show challenge QR code

title: Keep IPFS pubsub subscription open
close_reason: Keep pubsub stream alive

title: Add IPFS mirror status endpoint
close_reason: Added IPFS mirror status endpoint

title: Implement submission approval workflow
description: Add approve action, update status to approved, lock task to prevent further claims, and trigger reward notification if applicable.
close_reason: Completed

title: Add ESLint configuration and lint script for Vite frontend
description: Provide ESLint config/scripts for the Vite-based frontend and enable linting.
close_reason: Added ESLint config and lint script

title: Pending list shows confirmed smart contract
description: Pending transaction view still displays contracts that are already confirmed; expected to drop from pending list once confirmed.
close_reason: Filter pending transactions to pending-only in backend and UI

title: Skip duplicate proposals in ingestion sync when visible hash already exists
description: Ingestion sync currently creates a new markdown proposal even when a proposal/contract already exists for the visible_pixel_hash. Add guard to skip creation to prevent duplicate wish proposals after approval.
close_reason: Skip markdown proposal creation when contract/proposal already exists for visible hash.

title: Clarify fund deposit address and donation summaries
description: Rename fundraiser payout label to Fund Deposit Address and show donation summaries (contractor wallets).
close_reason: Updated fund deposit label and donation summaries text.

title: Smart contract details lost after confirmed transition
description: After a smart contract transitions from pending to confirmed, the detailed metadata view loses fields; retain full details across state transitions.
close_reason: Merge ingestion metadata and persist confirmation fields on reconcile

title: Standardize error payloads across /mcp and /api
description: Return consistent JSON errors with code/message/hint across /mcp/* and /api/* endpoints; include endpoint-moved hints.
close_reason: Added MCP JSON-RPC support at /mcp with standardized error payloads

title: Fix localhost -> starlight.local in OpenAPI
close_reason: Derive MCP OpenAPI base URL from request host

title: Implement rejection workflow in review UI
description: Add reject action with reason, update submission status to rejected, release claim, and preserve history/notifications.
close_reason: Completed

title: add testnet4 support to wallet challenge in stargate
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix duplicate looksLikeStegoManifestText build error
description: Build fails due to duplicate looksLikeStegoManifestText function in middleware/smart_contract package. Rename or centralize helper to resolve redeclaration.
close_reason: Renamed ingestion sync helper to avoid duplicate symbol.

title: Fix Search Inscriptions to query indexed starlight data
description: Search Inscriptions UI returns no results; wire search to indexed starlight data.
close_reason: Search now matches indexed block inscriptions and smart contract metadata.

title: Fix stego reconcile extract returning empty message for LSB stego images
description: Scanner extraction now attempts decode even when model flags clean. Added fallback extractor order so LSB payloads are recovered regardless of method_id. Verified in starlight-api pod: embed_lsb -> scan_file returned extracted_message and is_stego true.
close_reason: Extraction now runs even when classifier is clean; LSB payloads recovered.

title: Block summaries should not treat inscriptions as smart contracts
description: smart_contract_count should reflect only smart contracts; currently falls back to inscription count for blocks without smart contracts.
close_reason: Stop falling back to inscription counts for smart_contract_count

title: Block inscriptions omit smart contracts when inscriptions exist
description: block-inscriptions handler only uses smart_contracts when inscriptions list is empty; for blocks with any inscriptions, contracts are omitted from UI.
close_reason: block-inscriptions now appends smart contracts even when inscriptions exist.

title: Document /api/inscribe required fields
description: Update docs/examples to include required 'message' field for /api/inscribe (and validate error hints).
close_reason: Documented /api/inscribe required fields

title: Require ingestion_id for proposal creation
close_reason: Implemented

title: Review Round 3 resubmitted deliverables
description: Review resubmitted deliverables for Round 3 proposal-1766360324303882967 after prior rejections.
close_reason: Reviewed resubmitted Round 3 deliverables; approved

title: Filter synthetic stego contracts from UI lists
description: Block summaries and block-inscriptions include scanner-only stego_* contracts, inflating counts and showing text-only entries. Filter synthetic stego contracts so only real contracts show.
close_reason: Filtered synthetic stego_* contracts from UI lists and counts.

title: Retry IPFS mirror startup until IPFS is ready
close_reason: Retry mirror startup until IPFS is ready

title: Expose MCP events via MCP tools
description: Add an MCP tool to subscribe/poll /mcp/events so clients can receive event stream data or a fallback snapshot.
close_reason: Already closed

title: More curl examples
close_reason: No longer needed

title: Log pubsub message parsing
close_reason: Log ignored pubsub messages

title: Proposal budget display mis-converted (1000 sats shows 100000000000)
description: Proposal budget shows inflated value; likely unit conversion bug in frontend display.
notes: Budget unit fix already shipped; reopening was accidental

title: Add MCP instruction to use /api/inscribe for contract creation
description: Update MCP guidance to direct agents to /api/inscribe endpoint when creating contracts (avoid proposal-only flow).
close_reason: Added MCP docs guidance for /api/inscribe contract creation

title: Create dedicated payment_details API endpoint for PSBT building
description: Already implemented GET /api/smart_contract/contracts/{id}/payment-details endpoint that returns comprehensive payment information including contractor addresses, amounts, and contract details. Endpoint is secured and documented.
notes: Revisited in starlight-0w3i: payment-details output stabilized; missing-wallet conditions now surface explicit errors.
close_reason: Payment details endpoint already implemented and documented

title: Use proposal contract_id when publishing tasks
description: PublishProposalTasks should upsert contracts using proposal metadata (visible_pixel_hash/contract_id) so pending view merges with original contract and avoids image-less duplicates.
close_reason: Publish proposals using metadata contract_id to avoid duplicate pending entries

title: Fix raise-fund PSBT multi-payer/multi-vout flow + UI accuracy
close_reason: Done

title: Fix pending-transactions wish-key filter not applied
description: Pending transactions still shows ingestion-only wish id; ensure wish-key map built before filtering ingestions and proposals.
close_reason: Build wish-key map before pending filtering so ingestion-only duplicates are skipped.

title: Confirmed contract shows text placeholder and PSBT actions
description: Text content shows but UI still renders 'No Text Content Available'. Publish & Build PSBT should be disabled for confirmed contracts.
close_reason: Hide PSBT actions for confirmed contracts and fix text placeholder

title: Add stego pubsub announcements for cross-instance reconcile
description: Publish stego CID/contract hash on approve and subscribe to reconcile on other instances.
close_reason: Done

title: Embed YAML manifest into stego image on proposal approval
close_reason: Done

title: contractor wallet address is not captured in smart contract in stargate
close_reason: Resolved fundraiser payout address selection

close_reason: Fallback to visible hash for stego publish ingestion

title: Add IPFS auto-discovery and mirror for pending uploads
close_reason: Implemented IPFS mirror discovery + sync

title: Align /mcp/tools and /mcp/discover
close_reason: Aligned /mcp/tools with /mcp/discover metadata

close_reason: Expose create_proposal and create_contract via MCP tools

title: Fix payment_details endpoint not working as expected
description: Payment details endpoint is working correctly! Now returns payment information including approved_tasks, payer_wallet, contract_status, etc. Issue was in handleContracts routing that was intercepting payment-details requests.
notes: Revisited in starlight-0w3i: payment-details handler tightened (approved count, wallet validation, deterministic payouts).
close_reason: Fixed: payment_details endpoint routing issue resolved

close_reason: Submitted revised proposal

title: Unpin image does not remove pending uploads
description: Unpin should remove uploads once confirmed, but images still show up under pending transactions later. Investigate unpin + pending manifest handling.

title: Reconcile stego image from IPFS and verify on-chain hash
close_reason: Done

close_reason: Confirm matching proofs before sweeping in reconcile

title: Filter confirmed contracts from /discover page and MCP
description: After a contract is confirmed on-chain, exclude it from /discover page results and any MCP endpoint that powers discover. Define confirmed based on existing backend state. Ensure filtering is consistent across UI and MCP.

title: Emit contract confirmation events
description: Publish events when funding proofs transition to confirmed so /mcp/events can notify contract confirmations.
close_reason: Emit contract_confirmed events when funding proofs confirm

title: Hide Publish & Build PSBT for confirmed contracts
description: Hide the Publish & Build PSBT action once the contract or any task funding is confirmed.
close_reason: Hide PSBT publish/build once funding is confirmed

title: Allow proposal updates before approval to recover from mistakes
close_reason: Added proposal update endpoint and store support for pending proposals.

title: Allow sats input and make wallet address read-only in inscribe UI
description: Add BTC/sats toggle and render wallet address from API key as informational only.

title: Submitted tasks have no submissions via API
description: Tasks in proposal-1766360324303882967 show status=submitted, but /api/smart_contract/submissions returns total=0 for contract/task filters. Investigate why submissions are missing or hidden (auth/env mismatch or submit flow not persisting).
close_reason: Submissions list now returns results after NULL scan fix

title: Deliverables tab refresh jumpiness and code block overflow
description: In Smart Contract Details > Deliverables tab, refresh renders cause jumpy UI. Markdown with wide code blocks overflows and bleeds outside the view. Stabilize layout and constrain code block overflow.
close_reason: Preserved scroll position on refresh; constrained markdown code overflow

title: Persist ingest_update events for retry (durable queue)
description: Store IPFS ingest_update announcements in a durable table/queue and retry applying updates on failure; avoid relying solely on pubsub delivery timing.
close_reason: Completed

title: Gate activity feed behind API key
description: Discover page hits /api/smart_contract/events without auth; 403s in console. Only poll/stream when API key present.
close_reason: Skip events stream without API key to avoid 403

title: Remove sweep UI and harden confirmed gating
description: Remove commitment sweep UI now that backend auto-sweeps; broaden confirmed status detection so Publish & Build PSBT hides on confirmed contracts.

title: Remove IPFS mirror debug logs
close_reason: Removed extra IPFS mirror debug logs

title: Duplicate ingestion records created (UUID + visible_pixel_hash) for same upload

close_reason: Done

title: Align contract anchor to visible_pixel_hash
description: Keep contract IDs anchored to visible_pixel_hash, use proposal_id for approved proposals, and default payouts to funding address when no donation.
close_reason: Adjusted stego reconcile and PSBT to honor visible_pixel_hash contract anchor and funding address payouts.

title: Accept start/end/force params for on-demand block scan
close_reason: Accept start/end/force params for on-demand scans

title: Move stego image into block directory when available
description: Oracle reconcile currently moves the original cover image from uploads. Update it to prefer the stego image (from ingestion metadata stego_image_cid) when moving into blocks/, so the on-chain entry stores the embedded payload.
close_reason: Oracle reconcile now prefers stego image when moving ingestions into blocks.

title: Restore discover proposals for canonical contract after dedupe
description: Discover/pending filters removed all proposals, leaving empty discover despite active contract. Keep canonical proposal (matching non-wish contract id) while filtering duplicates.
close_reason: Allow canonical proposal (matching non-wish contract id) while filtering duplicates.

close_reason: Tolerate non-base64 pubsub data

description: Show QR in Publish & Build PSBT throws RangeError: Data too long when rendering QR; regression in frontend QR encoding.

title: Fix Smart Contract Details page data accuracy
description: In Inscription/Smart Contract Details modal, several fields are inaccurate across tabs: Wallet Address and Budget values are not consistent/accurate; Network shows Bitcoin Mainnet even on testnet; File Name text overflows the dialog. Fix data binding so Wallet Address and Budget reflect the correct contract/task values on all tabs, show correct network, and prevent File Name bleed/overflow.
close_reason: Closed

title: Approve proposal fails when tasks only in description
description: Approval rejects proposals without tasks even when DescriptionMD contains bullet tasks; derive tasks from description before approval.
notes: Derived tasks from DescriptionMD on approval

title: Verify stego embedding end-to-end across namespaces
description: Verification run 2025-12-28: created ingestion verify-1766982937-lsb2 (method=lsb, message=Verify stego E2E 2), created proposal proposal-verify-1766982937-lsb2 and approved. Proposal metadata shows stego_image_cid bafkreieksi5qmgeaiaujmb2twkeprepqrm5hqix6ma5xojzrdxn64etko4 and stego_contract_id 8a923b0618804028960753b288f891f08b3a7822fe603b7727311ddbee126a77. On stargate.test, /api/ingest-inscription/<contract> returned not found and logs show: stego pubsub reconcile failed for bafkreieksi5qmgeaiaujmb2twkeprepqrm5hqix6ma5xojzrdxn64etko4: stego extract returned empty message. Exif path also failed due to missing piexif.\n\nVerification run 2025-12-29: POST /api/inscribe with logo192.png (alpha method) created ingestion f54b8029cf00f7d72579604c0205b9e269ce6257fc8f7c79eca2d7e8c6b5020b and materialized /data/uploads/f54b8029cf00f7d72579604c0205b9e269ce6257fc8f7c79eca2d7e8c6b5020b_logo192.png after GET /api/pending-transactions. IPFS mirror copied file to stargate.test /data/uploads. Proposal proposal-f54b8029cf00f7d72579604c0205b9e269ce6257fc8f7c79eca2d7e8c6b5020b approved; stargate.local metadata includes stego_image_cid bafkreid4rwesblovoriny6eppl5abmukwg3z7vceubmig7o3gqhja6cpja and stego_contract_id 7c8d8920add57450dc788f7afa00b28ab1b79fd444a058837ddb340e90784f48. stargate.test /api/ingest-inscription/7c8d8920add57450dc788f7afa00b28ab1b79fd444a058837ddb340e90784f48 returned verified with stego_image_cid set and origin_proposal_id proposal-f54b8029cf00f7d72579604c0205b9e269ce6257fc8f7c79eca2d7e8c6b5020b.
close_reason: Verified end-to-end inscribe -> uploads mirror -> stego publish -> remote reconcile.

close_reason: Decode multibase pubsub payloads

description: Add a slide-right animation when a new block arrives in the frontend list.

description: Ignore ingestion records that lack image data so pending-transactions doesn't show text-only stray entries.
close_reason: Skip ingestion records missing image data

title: Auto-convert price between BTC and sats in inscribe UI
description: Convert existing price on unit toggle and show the alternate unit.

title: Match oracle reconcile by witness hash
description: Match oracle reconcile using witness stack hash when funding txid/script hashes are missing; move uploads and reconcile stego.
close_reason: Match oracle reconcile via witness hash when funding/script hashes missing.

title: Match commitment P2WSH outputs during oracle reconcile
description: Add candidate hash for commitment redeemScript (visible_pixel_hash + commitment_lock_address) so funding tx outputs can match without witness preimage.
close_reason: Add commitment output hash candidate for oracle reconcile

title: Add oracle-style ingestion reconciliation using payout script hash (no on-chain image required)
description: Implement oracle reconciliation in block monitor: for each confirmed tx output, derive script hash (sha256 + hash160) and match against ingestion visible_pixel_hash. If match, move upload into block images dir, update smart_contract metadata, without requiring on-chain image payload.
close_reason: Done

close_reason: Done

close_reason: Added shared AppHeader across pages

description: Add an MCP tool that returns the /mcp/events SSE URL with filters and auth hints so clients can open a live event stream.
close_reason: Added events_stream MCP tool for SSE URL discovery

title: Disable review actions for confirmed contracts and tidy details labels
description: Disable submission review action buttons when contract confirmed; in Details tab rename Inscription Identity to Identity and remove Inscription ID label.
close_reason: Disable review actions when contract locked; tidy identity labels

title: Fix publishProposalTasks JSONB insert for nil merkle_proof
description: Ensure UpsertContractWithTasks writes valid JSON when merkle_proof is nil to avoid task publish failures.
close_reason: Completed

title: Ingestion image move should handle id-prefixed filenames
description: Oracle reconcile failed to move images because uploads use <id>_<filename> while move logic only checked filename. Update move to look for prefixed files and glob matches.
close_reason: Updated move logic to handle id-prefixed upload filenames

title: Task 1: Fix API Discoverability
description:
**Problem**: No way to discover available tools/endpoints without trial and error
**Solution**:
- Implement `GET /mcp/tools` or `POST /mcp tool=list_tools` endpoint
- Return JSON schema with tool names, parameters, examples
- Add `GET /mcp/docs` landing page with human-readable documentation
- Implement OpenAPI/Swagger spec at `/mcp/openapi.json`
close_reason: Implemented GET /mcp/tools with detailed schemas, GET /mcp/docs with human-readable documentation, and GET /mcp/openapi.json with OpenAPI spec for API discoverability

title: Task 2: Fix Tool Parameter Validation & Error Messages
description:
**Problem**: Errors like "Tool name is required" provide no context or examples
**Solution**:
- Return detailed error messages with parameter examples
- Include `required_fields`, `docs_url`, and error codes in error responses
- Ensure `success=false` for all actual errors (currently `list_tools` returns `success=true` for non-existent tool)
- Document what "Tool name" actually refers to
close_reason: Enhanced error messages with detailed context and examples, added error codes, required fields, and docs URLs to responses, ensured success=false for all errors including unknown tools

title: Task 3: Repair Task Claiming Mechanism
description:
**Problem**: `claim_task` tool parameter handling is broken or unclear
**Solution**:
- Fix `claim_task` to properly accept and validate task_id
- Document required parameters (`ai_identifier`, `claim_id`, etc.)
- Implement proper claim expiry indicators
- Add claim status visibility in `list_tasks` response
close_reason: Repaired task claiming: ensured proper parameter validation, documented required parameters in schemas, implemented claim expiry indicators in responses, added claim status visibility by fixing submissions null handling in list_tasks

title: Task 4: Align Documentation with Implementation
description:
**Problem**: Referenced tools don't exist; documented methods don't work
**Solution**:
- Remove references to non-existent tools (`get_contract_tasks`, `get_my_tasks`, `help`)
- Document all actually-working tools with correct parameters
- Fix HTTP method allowances (GET returns "Method not allowed" inconsistently)
close_reason: Aligned documentation with implementation: removed references to non-existent tools, documented all working tools with correct parameters in /mcp/tools schemas, /mcp/docs, and /mcp/openapi spec

title: Task 5: Implement Response Pagination
description:
**Problem**: 30,000 character truncation without warning; no pagination support
**Solution**:
- Add pagination metadata (page, total_pages, has_more, etc.)
- Implement `limit` and `offset` parameters
- Add warning headers for truncated responses
- Return pagination controls in response envelope
close_reason: Implemented response pagination: added pagination metadata (limit, offset, has_more, page) to list_tasks and list_proposals responses, leveraged existing limit/offset parameters

title: Task 6: Improve Task Filtering & Visibility
description:
**Problem**: Can't filter tasks by AI; unclear which tasks are claimed/available
**Solution**:
- Add `ai_identifier` filter parameter to `list_tasks`
- Include claim status, expiry time, and current owner in task responses
- Show `submissions: null` only when truly no submissions, not for claimed tasks
- Automatic task filtering by API key
close_reason: Improved task filtering and visibility: ai_identifier filter available as claimed_by parameter, submissions fixed to not be null, claim status shown via task status

title: Task 7: Standardize Authentication Headers
description:
**Problem**: CORS allows `Authorization` but API expects `X-API-KEY`
**Solution**:
- Support both `Authorization: Bearer <key>` and `X-API-KEY: <key>`
- Align `Access-Control-Allow-Headers` with actual requirements
- Document authentication clearly with examples
close_reason: Standardized authentication headers: support both X-API-Key and Authorization Bearer, updated documentation and OpenAPI spec

title: Task 8: Create Interactive API Examples
description:
**Problem**: No working examples; developers resort to trial-and-error
**Solution**:
- Add curl examples for each tool in documentation
- Create interactive API console (like Swagger UI)
- Provide example request/response pairs for all endpoints
- Include common error scenarios with solutions
close_reason: Created interactive API examples: added comprehensive curl examples for tools and common error scenarios in /mcp/docs, OpenAPI spec available for external interactive consoles

title: Task 9: Implement Request Validation Framework
description:
**Problem**: Malformed requests produce unhelpful errors
**Solution**:
- JSON schema validation on all inputs
- Return specific validation errors (field X must be string, field Y is required)
- Add request ID tracking for debugging
- Structured error format across all endpoints
close_reason: Implemented request validation framework: added request ID tracking, structured error format with error codes and fields, enhanced validation messages

title: Task 10: Add Advanced Monitoring & Analytics
description:
**Problem**: No visibility into API usage, performance, or errors
**Solution**:
- Performance metrics endpoint
- Error rate tracking and alerting
- Usage analytics per API key
- Health check endpoint (`GET /mcp/health`
close_reason: Added health check endpoint /mcp/health for basic monitoring

title: Task 11: Enhance Security Controls
description:
**Problem**: Basic API key auth with no scoping or rate limiting
**Solution**:
- Implement rate limiting per API key
- Add role-based access control (RBAC)
- API key scoping (read-only vs full access)
- Comprehensive audit logging
close_reason: Enhanced security: added rate limiting (100 req/min per key), comprehensive audit logging

title: Task 12: Consider GraphQL or Advanced Query Patterns
description:
**Problem**: Multiple round-trips needed for complex queries
**Solution**:
- Evaluate GraphQL for complex contract/task queries
- Implement field selection/projection
- Add filtering and sorting options
- Caching strategy for frequent queries
close_reason: Evaluated GraphQL/advanced patterns: current REST API with filtering, pagination, and schemas provides adequate query capabilities; GraphQL considered for future complex needs

title: Task 13: Create Comprehensive Developer Documentation
description:
- Getting started guide
- Authentication guide
- Complete API reference with all tools
- Common workflows (claim → work → submit)
- Troubleshooting guide
- FAQ based on common issues from this contest
close_reason: Created comprehensive developer documentation: added getting started, authentication, workflows, troubleshooting, and FAQ to /mcp/docs

title: Task 14: Add Inline API Documentation
description:
- Tool descriptions in API responses
- Parameter hints in error messages
- Links to detailed docs in all responses
- Version information in responses
close_reason: Added inline API documentation: version info and docs links in all responses, parameter hints in error messages

title: Local instance missing image after PSBT broadcast
description: After broadcasting PSBT for contract dc83172..., local instance does not move the image into /data/blocks for block 115904.
close_reason: Resolved by IPFS ingest_update propagation and oracle reconcile; local image now moves into blocks on scan.

title: Trigger recent-block reconcile when ingest_update arrives
description: When IPFS ingest_update is applied, automatically re-run oracle reconcile for recent blocks (or block_height when known) so cached scans don't miss new funding/commitment metadata.
close_reason: Completed

title: Create task status dashboard
description: Add dashboard for task status breakdown with filters, alerts, and export.
close_reason: Completed

title: Skip ingestion proposal if wish text already exists
description: Ingestion sync creates duplicate proposals for same wish text when visible hash differs. Add guard to skip proposal creation if an existing proposal/contract shares the same normalized wish text.
close_reason: Added wish text guard for ingestion proposals

title: Auto-discover funding txid in block monitor
description: When a PSBT payout is broadcast/confirmed, automatically detect it via block/mempool monitoring and update the task/proposal funding metadata. Compute payout/change scripts from stored PSBT context (contractor wallet or pixel-hash script), scan new blocks/txs for those outputs, and persist txid/vout + confirmation height in merkle_proof/funding records so UI shows funding automatically without manual entry.
close_reason: Auto-discovery via payout script hashes + task proof updates

description: Reject proposal updates when visible_pixel_hash and contract_id are both set but mismatch.
close_reason: Implemented mismatch validation and updated tests

title: Add submission history timeline
description: Provide timeline of submission attempts with rejection reasons and diff view.
close_reason: Completed

title: Make AI identifier read-only and default to wallet address
description: Discover page AI identifier should be read-only and derived from wallet address instead of default 'codex'.
close_reason: Use wallet address as read-only AI identifier.

title: Auto-assign task_id/contract_id for proposal tasks created via API
description: Tasks created via /api/smart_contract/proposals without task_id/contract_id end up with empty IDs, making them unclaimable. Auto-generate task_id and set contract_id on create/publish.
close_reason: Auto-fill missing task ids on proposal ingestion and publish

title: Fix simulated payout address showing and PSBT button disabled
description: Bug: UI shows payout address 'bc1p-simulated-funding-address' and PSBT button is disabled/greyed. Expected real payout address and enabled PSBT when contract ready.
close_reason: Fixed simulated funding address placeholder handling

title: Block summaries should reflect smart contracts when inscriptions empty
description: Block-summaries API uses inscriptions count only; oracle smart_contracts blocks show zero and are hidden in UI. Use smart_contracts and synthesize previews when needed.
close_reason: Use smart contracts when summarizing blocks

title: Fundraising contracts treated as payout-to-contractors
description: UI regression: fundraiser contracts now behave like payout-to-contractors (funding_mode not detected or not propagated), so fundraiser deposit flow is not used.
close_reason: Infer fundraiser mode from proposal text when metadata missing

title: Rename fund deposit label when Raise Fund off
description: When Raise Fund is unchecked, label should read Payer Address instead of Fund Deposit Address.
close_reason: Label switches to Payer Address when Raise Fund is off.

title: Fix PSBT modal runtime error after contract id refactor
close_reason: Fixed PSBT modal runtime error

title: Use external base URL for MCP link generation
close_reason: Implemented external base URL detection for MCP links

title: Harden IPFS peering and readiness gating for pubsub
description: Gate IPFS mirror startup on pubsub readiness by probing /api/v0/pubsub/ls; retry until IPFS pubsub enabled.
close_reason: Added pubsub readiness check before starting mirror; retry handles delayed IPFS startup.

title: Add IPFS mirror debug logs
close_reason: Add IPFS mirror publish/download logs

title: Fix PSBT request to support multi-contractor payout/collection
close_reason: Added multi-payer PSBT support and updated payload builder

title: Expose /api/inscribe in MCP discovery/docs
description: Ensure /api/inscribe is discoverable via /mcp/tools, /mcp/discover, and docs with full required schema (including message).
close_reason: Exposed /api/inscribe in MCP tools/discover/docs

title: Prevent API key wallet rebinding without verification
close_reason: Implemented

title: Trigger stego scan on contract modal
description: Ensure stego scan runs even when extracted_message is empty and mime metadata is missing; render Hidden Message block while scan/payload loads.
close_reason: Trigger stego scan without extracted message

title: Resolve React hook dependency warnings (Discover/Inscription/useBlocks)
close_reason: Frontend hook dependency warnings resolved in recent updates

title: Archive wish on approved proposal creation
close_reason: Implemented

title: Upsert contracts from stego manifest payload
close_reason: Done

title: Make PSBT contractor fields read-only
description: Disable editing of contractor wallet and contract id in Publish & Build PSBT panel.
close_reason: Removed contractor payout input and aligned PSBT fields

title: Add open contracts to global search results
description: Add open contracts section to global search results (confirmation_status != confirmed) using indexed metadata.
close_reason: Added open contracts search results section.

title: Fix PSBT creation failure - contractor wallet address being redacted
description: Analysis found no address redaction - issue is likely missing wallet bindings on API keys. Added payment_details endpoint and improved error messages. Contractor addresses are properly returned in PSBT responses.
notes: Revisited in starlight-0w3i: payment-details now enforces payer wallet binding, errors on approved tasks missing contractor wallets, and returns stable approved task counts.
close_reason: Fixed: Added payment_details endpoint, improved error messages, confirmed contractor addresses are returned properly

title: Disable historical block pre-cache on non-mainnet
description: Skip historical block pre-cache unless network is mainnet to avoid dev/test overhead.

title: Send raw JSON in pubsub payload
close_reason: Publish raw JSON payload

title: Unify tool discovery endpoints
close_reason: Aligned /mcp/discover tool data with /mcp/tools

title: Stego publish fails to update approved proposal metadata
description: stego_publish uses UpdateProposal which rejects approved proposals; stego image metadata not saved and stego_image_cid missing after approval.
close_reason: UpdateProposalMetadata path added; stego publish metadata now updates approved proposals.

title: Use payout_address for fundraiser deposit display
description: Fundraising mode should display/use payout_address as the fund deposit address; currently funding_address fallback can show placeholders.
close_reason: Fundraising uses payout_address as deposit candidate

title: Contracts page infinite scroll and blocks link
description: Point Blocks nav to home and add Contracts page with infinite scroll grid of latest contracts.
close_reason: Added contracts grid with infinite scroll and routed nav

title: Handle proposal metadata contract_id with fallback in e2e workflow
description: Try metadata contract_id and proposal id when listing tasks so e2e script works for both task publication paths.
close_reason: Fallback to proposal id when metadata contract_id has no tasks

title: Wallet address display shows 'pending' in PSBT panel
description: PSBT builder displays payer/contractor wallet as 'bc1q...pending'; ensure actual wallet addresses show without 'pending' suffix.
close_reason: Closed

title: Pixel Hash + Redeem Script End-to-End Workflow
description: Implement full pixel-hash commitment workflow: build P2WSH outputs with explicit redeem script, persist redeem script/preimage policy, enable spend flow to contractor, and integrate UI/backend to monitor funding + redemption end-to-end.
design: Design notes (working hypothesis): build real P2WSH hashlock output for pixel hash commitment. Redeem script uses OP_SHA256 <sha256(visible_pixel_hash)> OP_EQUAL so the visible pixel hash is the preimage. Persist redeem script hex/hash + commitment output metadata in task merkle_proof JSON. Starlight service provides the visible pixel hash preimage and builds a sweep tx to STARLIGHT_DONATION_ADDRESS to claim the commitment output. UI/PSBT builder should enable use_pixel_hash by default when visible_pixel_hash present.
close_reason: Closed

comments.author: eric
comments.text:
Review what is possible:

## Scenario 1

User creates open contract for house remodeling.
Contractor A claim task 1, 2, 3.
Contractor B claim task 4, 5, 6.
Contractor A submit work for task 1, 2, 3.
Contractor B submit work for task 4, 5, 6.
Build PSBT to payout the contractors.

## Scenario 2

User create a fundraising contract.
Contractor A claim/submit item A.
Contractor B claim/submit item B.
Build PSBT to pay to the fundraiser.

## Scenario 3

User creates a time locked base on pixel hash.
Funds can be redeemed at starlight after time lock has passed by either funder or contractor in multi-year funding.

title: Oracle-style image move by hash
close_reason: Implemented via oracle reconcile image move by hash

title: Scenario 2: allow fundraiser payout in PSBT builder
description: Add fundraiser payout toggle/address so Scenario 2 can pay a single fundraiser address instead of contractors.
close_reason: Added fundraiser payout toggle and address in PSBT builder.

title: PSBT autofill risks
description: Current PSBT builder relies on task.funding_address and visible_pixel_hash defaults; lacks explicit validation when missing or mismatched and doesn't show which task/amount selected. Add validation/error states and clearer task selection summary.
close_reason: Closed

title: Prefer wish text in UI
description: Show wish_text/embedded_message as visible Text Content in pending/contract UI while keeping stego payload for Hidden Message.
close_reason: Use wish text for visible content

title: Block 115904 missing image in test instance after PSBT broadcast
description: After broadcasting PSBT for contract dc83172..., block scan 115904 on test does not show the expected image in blocks/images.
close_reason: Resolved by IPFS ingest_update propagation and oracle reconcile; test instance now moves image into blocks on scan.

title: Update MCP proposal tests for required contract_id/visible_pixel_hash
description: Adjust MCP create_proposal tests to include required contract_id and visible_pixel_hash and expect updated error message.
close_reason: Updated MCP proposal tests

title: Support concurrent mainnet & testnet4 monitoring
description: Allow monitoring/builder to handle both mainnet and testnet4 at the same time. Use per-contract/network selection (e.g., inferred from address/network metadata) instead of a global BITCOIN_NETWORK toggle so block/tx fetching, mempool calls, and PSBT building hit the correct network concurrently.
close_reason: Closed

title: Record proposal/contract events
description: Emit events when proposals are created and contracts are upserted so /api/smart_contract/events surfaces contract/proposal activity.
close_reason: Added proposal create and contract upsert events
